subtitle: Bo non é a palabra coa que me definiría coma desarrollador, é '<1>Caralludo</1>'
description: I was born in Noia, Galicia and have being coding half my life. I just enjoy a lot coding, when I'm bored I usually think about creating a new project, probably with whatever I'm learning at that time. For example, this website, I'm learning React and that's how I use the knowledge I'm acquiring, making this really sweets my quarantine.
p3: Welcome, I'm Ricardo Soto Estévez, software developer.
